org.opensocial.client
Class OpenSocialHttpMessage

java.lang.Object
  net.oauth.http.HttpMessage
      org.opensocial.client.OpenSocialHttpMessage

public class OpenSocialHttpMessage
extends net.oauth.http.HttpMessage

A small implementation of an HttpResponseMessage that does not require org.apache.http.client as a dependency.

Author:
Dan Holevoet
